lyrics.content:
Luz, yo quiero ver luz
Poder pintar de color un nuevo amanecer
Vivir, amar, 
Sentir y saber que 

Hoy, puede que no salga el sol
Aunque llueva
Tú y yo sabremos bailar
Nadie nos puede parar

We're dancing in the rain
Dancing in the rain

Life, gets you every time
Open up ,
You never know what you will find
You never know what waits inside

So, live
Like you'll never stop
Take this chance
And give it everything you've got
Come on and let the rhythm drop

We're dancing in the rain
Dancing in the rain

Keep on like it's never ending
Keep on till the light of day
Keep on dancing in the rain
The rain, the rain

Deja caer
Deja la lluvia caer
The rain, the rain, the rain

Deja caer
Deja la lluvia caer
The rain, the rain, the rain

The Rain, the rain

Dancing 
Dancing
Dancing 

Dancing 

Deja caer
Deja la lluvia caer

Aunque llueva y nos mojemos
No pararemoѕ de bailar

Keep on dancing in the rain
The rain, the rаin

Light, I want to see light
Paint the break of dawn
Live, love
Feel and know that

Today, the sun may not rise
But even if it rains
You and I will dance
No one can stop us

We're dancing in the rain
Dancing in the rain

Life, gets you every time
Open up ,
You never know what you will find
You never know what waits inside

So, live
Like you'll never stop
Take this chance
And give it everything you've got
Come on and let the rhythm drop

We're dancing in the rain
Dancing in the rain

Keep on like it's never ending
Keep on till the light of day
Keep on dancing in the rain
The rain, the rain

Let it come down

The rain, the rain, the rain

The Rain, the rain

Dancing

Dancing 

Let it come down

Even if it rains and we get wet
We won't ѕtop dancing

Keep on dancing in the rain
